property.name: linkToObject
property.label: Link to Object
property.description: API Name of Object to link the selected products to

property.name: linkToObjectRecordType
property.label: Record Type
property.description: The Developer Name of the record type used in 'Link to Object', will be used for any picklist fields on that object.

property.name: linkToObjectFieldName
property.label: Link to Object Field Name
property.description: API Name of the Parent Field on the Link to Object

property.name: linkToObjectProductFieldName
property.label: Link to Object Product fieldname
property.description: API name of the Product field on the Link to Object

property.name: productUsedFor
property.label: Product Used For
property.description: Only load products where Used For is
property.datasource: Account Survey,Promotion,Order,CPT,Fee,Incentive,Sample Order,Sample Order - E-Premise,Sample Order - UK,High Value,Employee Request

property.name: inputField1Name
property.label: Input Field 1 name
property.description: API name of the field on the linked object to use to capture quantity

property.name: inputField1Label
property.label: Input Field 1 label
property.description: The label to display for the quantity field

property.name: inputField2Name
property.label: Input Field 2 name
property.description: API name of the field on the linked object to used to capture price

property.name: inputField2Label
property.label: Input Field 2 label
property.description: The label to display for the price field

property.name: defaultPriceFromProduct
property.label: Default price from Product
property.description: Load the price from the Product record based on channel. Price for On premise, Wholesale Price for Off premise

property.name: showTotals
property.label: Show Totals
property.description: Ensure that Input Field 1 and 2 are numeric fields. Total Price is obtained by summing the products of Field 1 and 2.
